statements: DELETE FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE residential_area_name = 'Downtown' AND noise_level > 80;
DELETE FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE residential_area_name = 'Downtown' AND noise_level > 70.00
DELETE FROM noise_levels WHERE id = 10 AND date_recorded = '2022-01-15'
DELETE FROM complaints WHERE date_submitted < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Outside Park'
DELETE FROM fines WHERE amount > 1000 AND complaint_id IN (SELECT complaint_id FROM complaints WHERE location_id = 2)
